solution_line_template: The total increase of people was counted in {year_2005} - {year_2000} = <<{year_2005}-{year_2000}={years_passed}>>{years_passed} years.
In {years_passed} years, there is a total of {population_2005} - {population_2000} = {total_population_increase} people increase.
So, each year, the average number of people added is {total_population_increase}/{years_passed} = {average_increase_per_year}.
